thread.name: Infrahub Performance is Quite Slow and Buggy

messages.content:
hi, are you running on GCP? assuming that because you set `standard-rwo` for the neo4j pvc sc
our recommendation is to have at least 5000 iops for neo4j (https://docs.infrahub.app/topics/hardware-requirements)
so you should switch to at least `premium-rwo` with at least 100GB of provisioned storage (this will take you to 3000 iops) - as seen in the example here: https://docs.infrahub.app/guides/installation#using-helm-and-kubernetes

also the resources limits for the neo4j database seem low, our default values are twice larger, you could try that if solving storage performance is not enough
